title: Dorrie and the Blue Witch
description: When Dorrie is left home alone by the Big Witch, she decides to have a tea party with Gink. There is a knock on the door. Expecting Cook to arrive any minute, Dorrie opens the door. Instead of Cook, she finds the bad Blue Witch. Dorrie scours Cookâ€™s magic cabinet, uses its contents to capture the Blue Witch and receives a gold cauldron for her efforts.
author: Patricia Coombs
